item.title: With Trump pressure and a 'new Lebanon,' can Hezbollah's shadow economy be dismantled?
item.description: "Hezbollah finds itself in its greatest predicament since its foundation," one regional expert told CNBC.

item.title: Trade court won't reinstate tariff exemption on low-value 'de minimis' shipments, for now
item.description: A federal appeals court will soon hear oral arguments in a major case challenging Trump's "reciprocal" tariffs.
